notes_display: Obv./rev. blind spot; rev. die cracks
issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Ardashir II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left below the lorymbos, pointing upwards, pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing in ball of hair, pointing upwards, earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running the shoulders to the breast ornament (the latter not visible); dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; square altar shaft; to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar plates; altar flames, depicted by several lines in triangular form; to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Ardashir II, holding a barson with both hands, both figures facing inwards; dotted border
